create|screenbuilder: Run `$ cd %s` to switch to your project directory and continue working there. Once in the project root, you can add a new view or connect to a data provider by running `$ appbuilder add-view` or `$ appbuilder add-dataprovider`, respectively.
create|*default: Run `$ cd %s` to switch to your project directory and continue working there. Once in the project root, you can add a new view or connect to a data provider by running `$ appbuilder add-view` or `$ appbuilder add-dataprovider`, respectively.
add-about: You can now add another view by running `$ appbuilder add-view`.
add-dataprovider: You can now add authentication and authorization capabilities or add a list view by running `$ appbuilder add-authentication` or `$ appbuilder add-list`, respectively.
add-field: You can now add another field by running `$ appbuilder add-field`.
add-form: You can now add a field to this form by running `$ appbuilder add-field`.
add-view: You can now add a data provider, a form, or an about page to your project by running `$ appbuilder add-dataprovider`, `$ appbuilder add-form`, or `$ appbuilder add-about`, respectively.
add-authentication: You can now add another view by running `$ appbuilder add-view`.
add-list: You can now add another view by running `$ appbuilder add-view`.
